metadata.title: DEPRECATED: Evaluate to true if the string datatype is properly supported
metadata.description: This definition is intended to evalutate to true if the interpreter properly supports the string datatype and all of its valid operations.

modified.comment: Deprecating in favor of new OVAL Test Content

criteria.comment: True if the equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the equals operation with a single equal string.
Check of the equals operation with a single unequal string.

criteria.comment: True if the not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the not equal operation with a single equal string.
Check of the not equal operation with a single unequal string.

criteria.comment: True if the case insensitive equals operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the case insensitive equals operation with a single mixed case equal string.
Check of the case insensitive equals operation with a single mixed case unequal string.

criteria.comment: True if the case insensitive not equal operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the case insensitive not equal operation with a single mixed case equal string.
Check of the case insensitive not equal operation with a single mixed case unequal string.

criteria.comment: True if the pattern match operation is supported

criterion.comment: Check of the pattern match operation with a single string that matches the regular expression.
Check of the pattern match operation with a single string that doesn't match the regular expression.
